thread.title: IS CPF AN INDIRECT FORM OF TAXATION?
thread.title_full: IS CPF AN INDIRECT FORM OF TAXATION?

author: farhan
title: IS CPF AN INDIRECT FORM OF TAXATION?
text:
IS CPF AN INDIRECT FORM OF TAXATION?   Advertisement 
<Facebook post by Ng E-Jay> 
Singapore may have low direct taxes, but our CPF contributions are a form of indirect taxation. 
The government withholds our CPF savings via the CPF Life scheme and only returns it to us in small monthly instalments after retirement age. The opportunity cost in forgoing the use of CPF money constitutes an implicit financial penalty on Singaporeans. Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
